    • unionAttributesOfAPoint

      public static org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature unionAttributesOfAPoint​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection collec, StatisticOperation stat)
      Return a SimpleFeature with a single point as a geometry and the sum of every of the numeric fields of the input collection. String fields are copied taking the field from the first value. SimpleFeature geometries must be the same (we get the first one so if not, no errors will be thrown).
      Parameters:
      collec - input SimpleFeatureCollection of same geometry points
      stat - statistical operation to proceed on numeric fields
      Returns:
      The SimpleFeature with same schemas and summed numeric values

    • unionAttributesOfAPoint

      public static org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature unionAttributesOfAPoint​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection collec, StatisticOperation stat, java.util.List<java.lang.String> textAttributesToConcat)
      Return a SimpleFeature with a single point as a geometry and the sum of every of the numeric fields of the input collection. String fields are copied taking the field from the first value, except if they are indicated for concatenation (under the textAttributesToConcat array). SimpleFeature geometries must be the same (we get the first one so if not, no errors will be thrown).
      Parameters:
      collec - input SimpleFeatureCollection of same geometry points
      stat - statistical operation to proceed on numeric fields
      textAttributesToConcat - attributes to concatenate (can be null)
      Returns:
      The SimpleFeature with same schemas and summed numeric values

    • getSFCPart

      public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection getSFCPart​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection sFCToDivide, java.lang.String fieldName, java.lang.String attribute) throws java.io.IOException
      Create a SimpleFeatureCollection with features which designed attribute field matches a precise attribute value.
      Parameters:
      sFCToDivide - SimpleFeatureCollection to sort
      fieldName - field name to select features from
      attribute - wanted field
      Returns:
      a collection with matching features
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - unable to copy result in memory

    • getSFCPart

      public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection getSFCPart​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection sFCToDivide, java.lang.String[] fieldNames, java.lang.String[] attributes) throws java.io.IOException
      Create a SimpleFeatureCollection with features which a list of attribute field matches a list of strings. The index of the couple fieldName/attribute must match.
      Parameters:
      sFCToDivide - SimpleFeatureCollection to sort
      fieldNames - array of field names
      attributes - array of values
      Returns:
      a collection with matching features
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - unable to copy result in memory

      public static java.util.List<org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> selectIntersectMost​(java.util.List<org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> lG, org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry toIntersect)
      Make the intersection but for overlapping object, check if they are mostly included in the geometry (more than 50% of their footprint are inside geometry) or not
      Parameters:
      lG - List of input geometries
      toIntersect - Geometry to check relation with collection
      Returns:
      The selected collection

    • sortSFCWithArea

      public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection sortSFCWithArea​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection sFCToSort) throws java.io.IOException
      Sort a SimpleFeatureCollection by its feature's area (must be a collection of polygons). Uses a sorted collection and a stream method. That code may erase values if exactly the same area. Tried to find a better solution but it would have to be implemented (see here).
      Parameters:
      sFCToSort - SimpleFeature
      Returns:
      The sorted SimpleFeatureCollection
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - from DefaultFeatureCollection

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The sorted SimpleFeatureCollection

    • fromPolygonSFCtoRingMultiLines

      public static org.locationtech.jts.geom.MultiLineString fromPolygonSFCtoRingMultiLines​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection inputSFC)
      convert a collection of simple feature (which geometries are either Polygon or MultiPolygon) to a MultiLineString. It takes into account the exterior and the interior lines.
      Parameters:
      inputSFC - input SimpleFeatureCollection
      Returns:
      A list of LineString

    • gridDiscretize

      public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection gridDiscretize​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection in, double gridResolution) throws java.io.IOException
      Discretize the input SimpleFeatureCollection by generating a grid, cuting features by it and merge them all together. Erase every attributes.
      Parameters:
      in - Input SimpleFeatureCollection
      gridResolution - Resolution of the grid's mesh
      Returns:
      the discretized SimpleFeatureCollection
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if grid data cannot be accessed of output cannot be written into memory.

    • gridDiscretize

      public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection gridDiscretize​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection in, double gridResolution, boolean hexagonal) throws java.io.IOException
      Discretize the input SimpleFeatureCollection by generating a grid, cuting features by it and merge them all together. Erase every attributes.
      Parameters:
      in - Input SimpleFeatureCollection
      gridResolution - Resolution of the grid's mesh
      hexagonal - create an hexagonal grid
      Returns:
      the discretized SimpleFeatureCollection
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if grid data cannot be accessed of output cannot be written into memory.

    • getIntersectingFieldFromSFC

      public static java.lang.String getIntersectingFieldFromSFC​(org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry geometry, org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection sfc, java.lang.String fieldName)
      Get the value of a feature's field from a SimpleFeatureCollection that intersects a given Simplefeature (that is most of the time, a parcel or building). If the given feature is overlapping multiple SimpleFeatureCollection's features, we calculate which has the more area of intersection.
      Parameters:
      geometry - input Geometry
      sfc - Input SimpleFeatureCollection
      fieldName - The name of the field in which to look for the attribute
      Returns:
      the wanted filed from the (most) intersecting SimpleFeature}

    • getIntersectingSimpleFeatureFromSFC

      public static org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature getIntersectingSimpleFeatureFromSFC​(org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry geometry, org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection inputSFC)
      Get the SimpleFeature out of a SimpleFeatureCollection that intersects a given Geometry (that is most of the time, a parcel or building). If the given feature is overlapping multiple SimpleFeatureCollection's features, we calculate which has the more area of intersection.
      Parameters:
      geometry - input Geometry
      inputSFC - input collection
      Returns:
      the (most) intersecting SimpleFeature}

    • getIntersectingSimpleFeatureFromSFC

      public static org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature getIntersectingSimpleFeatureFromSFC​(org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry geometry, org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection inputSFC, org.locationtech.jts.geom.PrecisionModel precisionModel)
      Get the SimpleFeature out of a SimpleFeatureCollection that intersects a given Geometry (that is most of the time, a parcel or building). If the given feature is overlapping multiple SimpleFeatureCollection's features, we calculate which has the more area of intersection. Reduce the precision of the Geometrys
      Parameters:
      geometry - input Geometry
      inputSFC - input collection
      precisionModel - precision of the intersection
      Returns:
      the (most) intersecting SimpleFeature}
